faq.title: Ibibazo Byibanze
faq.subtitle: Wabona ibisubizo by'ibibazo byibanze kuri Ifatabuguzi z'abiyandikisha
faq.contactSupport: Itsinda ryacu ryaguha ubufasha mu bibazo byose by'inyongera
faq.changePlanAnswer: Yego, urashobora kongera cyangwa kugabanya Ifatabuguzi yawe igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Amahinduruko atangira gukora ku itangiriro ry'igihembwe cyawe gikurikira cyo kwishyura. Amahinduruko yo kongera aragabanurwa, mu gihe amahinduruko yo kugabanya atangira gukora nyuma y'igihembwe cyawe cyo kwishyura.
faq.commitmentAnswer: Oya, Ifatabuguzi zose ni ukwezi kukwezi nta gihe kirekire cyo kwiyandikisha. Urashobora guhagarika igihe icyo aricyo cyose nta fee. Abiyandikisha bawe bazakomeza kuba bafite uburenganzira kugeza impera z'igihembwe cyawe cyo kwishyura.
faq.devicesSimultaneously: Ni mudasobwa zingahe nshobora gukoresha hamwe?
faq.devicesAnswer: Umubare w'imirongo ishobora kuyobora hamwe itandukanye bitewe n'iIfatabuguzi. Nyamuneka reba imipaka y'umudasi yateguwe kuri Ifatabuguzi zose muri tabilo yacu y'igereranyo kugirango usange iyo ishimye cyane mu ngingo z'urugo rwawe.
faq.discountsAnswer: Nubwo ubu tutunga abagurana cyangwa amagabanyirizo yihariye, dukora imirimo yo gushyira mu bikorwa Ifatabuguzi yuzuye yo kugurana. Menya amakuru agezweho nk'uko dukomeza kongera ibyo dushyura mu biyandikisha byacu.
faq.paymentAnswer: Temera amafaranga yo kumurongo (MTN, Airtel), amakarita y'inguzanyo/yo kwishyura (Visa, MasterCard), no kohereza amafaranga mu banki. Amashyura yose arinde kandi yasohotswe kugirango arinde.
faq.offlineViewing: Nshobora kurodosha ibirimo kugirango nsubiremwo ndi kumurongo?
faq.offlineAnswer: Kuboneka kwo kurodosha ibirimo kumurongo bitewe n'iIfatabuguzi wahisemo. Nyamuneka subira inyuma igenzura rigereranywa ry'imikorere hagati y'amaIfatabuguzi kugirango ubone ayo afite ubushobozi bwo kurodosha n'imipaka yayo.
faq.regionalAnswer: Bitewe n'amasezerano y'uruhushya, birashoboka ko bimwe mu birimo ntibiboneka mu nsi zose. Urutonde rwacu rwateguwe neza kuri abateze amatwi bo mu Karere ka Afurika y'Iburasirazuba hamwe n'igice cy'igihugu n'icy'isi.
faq.cancelAnswer: Urashobora guhagarika igihe icyo aricyo cyose uva mu genamiterere yawe ya konti. Genda ku 'Abiyandikisha' ‚Üí 'Gucunga Ifatabuguzi' ‚Üí 'Hagarika Abiyandikisha'. Uburyo bwawe buzakomeza kugeza impera z'igihembwe cyawe cyo kwishyura.
faq.videoQuality: Ni ikihe kigero cya videwo narashobora gutegereza?
faq.qualityAnswer: Kigero cya videwo cyatandukanye bitewe n'iIfatabuguzi y'abiyandikisha, igera ku gisobanuro cya busanzwe kugeza kuri 4K Ultra HD. Nyamuneka reba igenzura ry'iIfatabuguzi ry'ibyo bitanga bisanzwe bihuye n'umwanya buri wese.
faq.billingCycle: Igihembwe cyanje cyo kwishyura kitangira ryari?
faq.billingAnswer: Igihembwe cyawe cyo kwishyura kitangira burundu mugihe wiyandikisha kandi gisubiramo ubwacyo buri minsi 30. Uzakira ikimenyetso mbere y'isubiramo rimwe na rimwe, kandi urashobora guhagarika igihe icyo aricyo cyose nta gihano.

difference.question: Ni iki gitandukanye Oliviuus n‚Äôizindi mbuga zo kureberaho?
difference.answer: Oliviuus ihuza ibirimo by‚Äôisi yose by‚Äôicyiciro cya mbere n‚Äôamafilime yihariye yo mu Rwanda, bigatanga urubuga rwubaha inkuru z‚ÄôAfurika rukanazigeza ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Dushyigikira abatunganya filime b‚ÄôAbanyarwanda no kugeza ibikorwa byabo ku isi yose.

cost.question: Oliviuus itwara angahe?
cost.answer: Oliviuus igira amafatabuguzi anyuranye atangira kuva kuri RWF 3,000 kugeza kuri RWF 10,000 buri kwezi. Buri ifatabuguzi itanga ibyo ukeneye bijyanye n‚Äôuburyo ureba‚Äîkuva kuri Kureba isanzwe kugeza kuri 4K n‚Äôindorerwamo nyinshi icyarimwe.

multipleDevices.question: Nshobora kureba Oliviuus ku bikoresho byinshi icyarimwe?
multipleDevices.answer: Yego! Ushobora kurebera kuri telefoni, tablette, mudasobwa, Smart TV, ndetse n‚Äôimikino icyarimwe. Umubare w‚Äôibikoresho ugenwa na ifatabuguzi wahisemo.

rwandanContent.question: Ni ubuhe bwoko bw‚Äôibirimo nyarwanda mubonekaho?
rwandanContent.answer: Dufite amoko menshi ya filime nyarwanda, documentaries, series n‚Äôibikorwa byihariye. Uhereye ku byamamare kugeza ku talent nshya, turi kubaka urubuga runini mu gusigasira inkuru n'umuco nyarwanda.

changeSubscription.question: Nshobora gute guhindura cyangwa kuzamura ifatabuguzi yanjye?
changeSubscription.answer: Ushobora guhindura ifatabuguzi igihe icyo ari cyo cyose muri konti yawe. Kuzamura bikorwa ako kanya, naho kugabanya bigatangira mu kwezi gukurikiyeho.

paymentMethods.question: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura mukoresha mu Rwanda?
paymentMethods.answer: Dukoresha uburyo bwose bukomeye burimo Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), amakarita (Visa, MasterCard), n‚Äôinyungu z‚Äôamabanki. Amakuru yose acungwa mu buryo bwizewe.

downloadOffline.question: Nshobora gukuramo filime nkazireba ntari kuri internet?
downloadOffline.answer: Yego! Ushobora gukuramo ibyo ukunda ukabireba aho uri hose. Igihe ndetse n‚Äôumubare w‚Äôibyo ushobora gukuramo biterwa na ifatabuguzi wahisemo.

outsideRwanda.question: Oliviuus iraboneka hanze y‚Äôu Rwanda?
outsideRwanda.answer: Kugeza ubu, Oliviuus yibanda ku Banyarwanda ariko dufite ifatabuguzi yo kwaguka muri EAC. Bamwe mu birimo bishobora kugira imipaka bitewe n‚Äôamasezerano ya lisansi.

videoQuality.question: Ni ubuhe bwiza bw‚Äôamashusho nshobora kubona?
videoQuality.answer: Ubwiza bujya hejuru kuva kuri standard kugeza kuri 4K Ultra HD bitewe n‚Äôipaki wahisemo n'igikoresho ukoresha. ifatabuguzi zo hejuru zifite HDR.

supportFilmmakers.question: Oliviuus ishyigikira ite abatunganya filime nyarwanda?
supportFilmmakers.answer: Dukorana n‚Äôingo z‚Äôitangizwa rya filime nyarwanda, tukabaha inzira nziza yo kuzikwirakwiza, amahirwe yo kubona inkunga, n‚Äôinyungu iruse izindi. Intego ni ukuzamura impano z‚ÄôAbanyarwanda.

termsOfService.title: Amabwiriza y'Imikoreshereze
termsOfService.welcome: Murakaza neza kuri Oliviuus, urubuga rwa streaming rugamije kugeza ibyishimo n'imyidagaduro ku baturage ba Rwanda no hanze yarwo. Aya Mabwiriza y'Imikoreshereze ("Amabwiriza") agenga uburyo ukoresha n'uburenganzira bwawe ku rubuga rwa Oliviuus, harimo urubuga rwacu, porogaramu za mobile, serivisi za streaming, n'ibindi byose bifitanye isano (buri hamwe bitwa "Serivisi").
termsOfService.agreementNotice: Ukoresha konti, wiyandikisha, cyangwa ukoresha Serivisi, wemera aya Mabwiriza. Niba utayemera, ntushobora gukoresha Oliviuus.

eligibility.title: Ubusabwa
points: Niba uri munsi ya 18, ugomba kugira uruhushya rw'ababyeyi cyangwa abarinzi gukoresha Serivisi.
Ugomba gutanga amakuru y'ukuri ku rubuga rwa konti yawe.
Dushobora guhagarika cyangwa gufunga konti zica aya mabwiriza.

accountRegistration.title: Iyandikishwa rya Konti
points1: Ugomba gutanga amakuru y'ukuri kandi yuzuye.
Wowe ni wowe ushinzwe kurinda amakuru ya login yawe.
Ugomba kutumenyesha ako kanya ibikorwa byose bidafututse.
points2: Gukora konti nyinshi ngo wibeshye ku gihe cy'igerageza cy'ubuntu.
Gusangira ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe n'abandi batari mu rugo rwawe.
Gukoresha cyangwa kwinjira muri konti y'undi utabiherewe uburenganzira.

freeTrial.title: Igerageza ry'Ubuntu
freeTrial.description: Oliviuus ishobora gutanga igerageza rimwe ku muntu umwe n'uburyo bwo kwishyura.
points: Urashobora guhagarika igihe icyo ari cyo cyose mbere y'uko igerageza rirangira kugira ngo wirinde kwishyuzwa.
freeTrial.warning: Kugerageza kwinyereza cyangwa kwirenga sisitemu y'igerageza ry'ubuntu birabujijwe.

subscriptionsPayments.title: Ububiko & Kwishyura
points: Wemerera Oliviuus kwishyura uburyo wahisemo bwo kwishyura (nko Mobile Money, ikarita).
Amafaranga y'ububiko yishyurwa buri kwezi keretse hari ibyo twavuze ukundi.
Amafaranga yose ntabwo asubizwa keretse amategeko abisaba.
Dushobora guhindura ibiciro, ariko tuzagutangariza mbere.

contentUsageRules.title: Amabwiriza ku Bikoreshwa by'Ibirimo
contentUsageRules.description: Oliviuus iguha uburenganzira buke, budashobora kwimurirwa, butari bwihariye bwo kubona ibirimo byacu ku mpamvu z'umuntu ku giti cye, zidafite inyungu z'ubucuruzi.
points: Gupakira, gukoporora, gufata amashusho yerekana kuri ecran, cyangwa gusakaza ibirimo utabiherewe uburenganzira.
Gukoresha Serivisi mu kwerekana rusange utabiherewe uburenganzira.
Kwirenga imipaka y'akarere cyangwa uburyo bwo kubungabunga umutekano.
Gukoresha bots, scripts, cyangwa ibikoresho byikora mu gukoresha Serivisi.
contentUsageRules.deviceLimit: Dushobora kugena umubare w'ibikoresho bishobora gukina icyarimwe.

intellectualProperty.title: Uburenganzira ku Mutungo w'Ubwenge
intellectualProperty.description: Ibirimo byose bya Oliviuus (filime, series, igishushanyo cy'urubuga, ibirango, logos, software) birakingirwa n'amategeko y'uburenganzira bwo guhanga n'ayandi mategeko y'umutungo w'ubwenge.
points: Gukora ibihangano bishingiye ku bikorwa byacu utabiherewe uburenganzira.
Gukoresha izina rya Oliviuus utabiherewe uruhushya rwanditse.

thirdPartyIntegrations.title: Imikoranire n'Abandi
thirdPartyIntegrations.description: Oliviuus ishobora gukorana n'abafatanyabikorwa b'abandi (ibikoresho by'isuzuma, abacuruzi b'amafaranga, hosting ya cloud).

termination.title: Guhagarika Konti
termination.description: Dushobora guhagarika cyangwa gufunga konti yawe niba:
points: Ukora ibikorwa binyuranyije n'amategeko cyangwa bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi,
termination.userRight: Urashobora kandi gusiba konti yawe igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.

serviceAvailability.title: Kugera kuri Serivisi
serviceAvailability.description: Duharanira gutanga serivisi itarangwamo interuro, ariko:
points: Guhagarara, ibikorwa byo kubungabunga, cyangwa amakosa birashobora kubaho.
Ibirimo bimwe birashobora kongerwa cyangwa gukurwaho utabibwiwe.

limitationOfLiability.title: Guhagarika Uburenganzira bwo Kwishyuzwa
limitationOfLiability.description: Ku rugero runini rushoboka nk'uko amategeko abigena:
points: Oliviuus ntiyishyuza ku byangiritse bitaziguye, ibyo biba impanuka, cyangwa ibihariye.
Uburenganzira bwacu bwose ntiburenza amafaranga wishyuye kuri Serivisi mu mezi 3 ashize.

changesToTerms.title: Impinduka ku Mabwiriza

changesToTerms.continuation: Gukomeza gukoresha Oliviuus nyuma yo kuvugurura bisobanura ko wemeye aya Mabwiriza mashya.

privacyPolicy.title: Politiki y'Ubwirinzi bw'Amakuru
privacyPolicy.introduction: Oliviuus ("twebwe," "turi," cyangwa "yacu") yihaye inshingano zo kurinda ubwirinzi bwawe. Iyi Politiki y'Ubwirinzi isobanura uburyo dukusanya, dukoresha, tubika, kandi turinda amakuru yawe bwite.

informationYouProvide.title: A. Amakuru utanga
points: Uburyo bwo kwishyura (Mobile Money cyangwa ikarita)
Ubutumwa bwo gutanga ibitekerezo cyangwa ubufasha bw'abakiriya
informationYouProvide.note: Ntitubika amakuru yose ya konti yawe y'ubwishyu‚Äîtubika gusa amakuru akenewe ku gikorwa.

questions.question: Uko wakora konti
questions.answer: Kanda kuri 'Injira' ku rubuga rwacu. Shyiramo email yawe, wihere ijambo ry'ibanga rikomeye, hanyuma urangize uburyo bwo kwemeza. Uzahabwa email yo kwemeza konti ya Oliviuus.

questions.question: Uko wasubiramo ijambo ry'ibanga
questions.answer: Jya ku rupapuro rwo kwinjira, kanda 'Forgot Password'. Shyiramo email yawe yanditswe, maze tuzohereze link yo gusubiramo ijambo ry'ibanga. Link irangirira mu masaha 24.

questions.question: Uko wemeza email yawe
questions.answer: Reba inbox ya email yawe ku butumwa bwa Oliviuus. Kanda ku link yo kwemeza kugirango wemeze konti yawe. Niba utabonye email, reba mu spam cyangwa junk folder.

questions.question: Uko wahindura amakuru ya konti yawe
questions.answer: Injira muri menu ya profile, hitamo 'Account Settings'. Hano ushobora kuvugurura amakuru yawe, email, ijambo ry'ibanga, n'amahitamo yo guhana amakuru mu buryo butekanye.

questions.question: Uburyo bwo kwishyura bwemewe
questions.answer: Oliviuus yemera Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), Visa, MasterCard, hamwe n'uburyo bw'imbere mu Rwanda. Ibikorwa byose bikorerwa mu nzira zitekanye zifite encryption.

questions.question: Uko trials zikorwa
questions.answer: Oliviuus rimwe na rimwe itanga trial z‚Äôigihe gito mu birori cyangwa ibikorwa byihariye. Izi trials zivugwa ku rubuga rwacu no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ifatabuguzi zisanzwe zishyurwa buri kwezi.

questions.question: Uko wahindura uburyo bwo kwishyura
questions.answer: Muri 'Billing & Payments' muri account settings, kanda 'Update Payment Method' kugirango winjize amakuru mashya y'ubwishyu. Subscription izakomeza nta nkomyi.

questions.question: Uko wasiba cyangwa wongera subscription
questions.answer: Gusiba: Jya muri 'Subscription Management', hitamo 'Cancel Subscription'. Kugarura: Jya ku rupapuro rwa subscription, hitamo 'Reactivate Subscription'. Impinduka zikorwa ku musozo w'igihe cyishyurwa.

questions.question: Ibikoresho n‚Äôahantu byemewe
questions.answer: Reba kuri: Web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge), mobile apps (iOS/Android), Smart TVs (Android TV, Samsung Tizen), consoles, na tablets. Internet ikenewe: 5 Mbps HD, 25 Mbps 4K.

questions.question: Impamvu video irimo buffering cyangwa ifite quality mbi
questions.answer: Buffering ikunze guterwa n'ikibazo cya network. Icyo wakora: 1) Kora speed test 2) Reba modem/router 3) Gabanya quality 4) Funga apps zikoresha internet nyinshi 5) Koresha connection ya wired.

questions.question: Uko wakura content kugirango urebe offline
questions.answer: Shaka icon yo download (‚Üì) ku bintu byemewe. Bikora gusa muri mobile app. Content irangira mu masaha 48 bitewe n'amasezerano ya license.

questions.question: Gukemura ibibazo bya playback cyangwa audio
questions.answer: Ibikorwa: 1) Refresh app 2) Reba audio output 3) Update browser/app 4) Siba cache & cookies 5) Gerageza ku kindi gikoresho 6) Reba service status.

questions.question: App irimo kugwa cyangwa gufunga
questions.answer: Uko wakemura: 1) Update version 2) Force quit & restart 3) Clear cache/data 4) Reinstall 5) Reba storage 6) Reba compatibility

questions.question: Website cyangwa app ntikora neza
questions.answer: Check: 1) Internet 2) Browser compatibility 3) Disable extensions/ad-blockers 4) Clear cache 5) Test incognito 6) Reba status.oliviuus.com

questions.question: Gusiba cache & cookies
questions.answer: Browser: Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Clear Data. Mobile: Device Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Oliviuus ‚Üí Storage ‚Üí Clear Cache. Byemera gukemura ibibazo byinshi.

questions.question: Kugumana app yawe ivuguruye
questions.answer: iOS: App Store ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí Updates. Android: Google Play ‚Üí My Apps ‚Üí Updates. Tuma automatic updates zibe ON.

questions.question: Kurinda konti yawe
questions.answer: Uko bikorwa: Shyira Ijambo banga rikomeye, ntugasangire Ijambo banga, sohoka ku bikoresho rusange, reba ibikorwa, wite ku batubuzi.

questions.question: Uko Oliviuus irinda Amakuru yawe
questions.answer: Twubahiriza Umutekano: Uburinzi busesuye, amakuru abikanwa umutekano ukomeye, Igenzura, GDPR/DPA, Kwishyura bitekanye. Amakuru y'ubwishyu ntabwo abikwa ku seriveri zacu.

questions.question: Kumenyesha ibibazo by'umutekano
questions.answer: Hamagara oliviuusteam@gmail.com ushyiremo Igihe, Igikoresho(Device), ibisobanuro. Itsinda ryacu rizagufasha.

questions.question: Igenzura ryihariye n'ubuyobozi bw'amakuru
questions.answer: Jya muri Igenamiterere rya Konti ugene: amateka, ibyugenerwa, (guhanahana)sharing, uruhushya rwo kubika(download permissions), itumanaho. Ushobora gusaba data export cyangwa account deletion.

storyChapters.title: Inzozi Zishingiye mu Rwanda
storyChapters.subtitle: Itangiriro ry‚Äôicyerekezo
storyChapters.content: Oliviuus yatangijwe nk‚Äôinzozi zishingiye ku kwitanga, kubura, kwihangana, n‚Äôukwizera ko inkuru z‚ÄôAbanyarwanda zikwiye kugaragara ku rwego rw‚Äôisi.

storyChapters.title: Urukundo rwa Olivier
storyChapters.subtitle: Impamvu y‚Äôihumure
storyChapters.content: Igitekerezo cyabayeho bwa mbere na HAGENIMANA Samuel, wakuze abona ko mukuru we, MANISHIMWE Olivier, akunda cyane filime. Olivier yakundaga kwiyerekana, kuyobora, kwandika no gukora byose bijyanye na sinema.

storyChapters.title: Ukuri
storyChapters.subtitle: Ibibazo byahuye na
storyChapters.content: Nk‚Äôuko abantu benshi  bafite impano babibona, Olivier yahuye n‚Äôamahirwe make, kwamamaza gake, gukwirakwiza bike, n‚Äôuburyo budaha amahirwe abashya bo muri sinema(filime).

storyChapters.title: Igitekerezo
storyChapters.subtitle: Guhindura ibitekerezo mu guhanga
storyChapters.content: Samuel yitegereje byose ‚Äî buri gihombo, buri kigeragezo. Hashize imyaka, yatekereje ku nzozi za mukuru we maze abaza: Ese hashobora kubaho urubuga rwashyiriweho gukwirakwiza, kwamamaza, no gutanga filime z‚ÄôAbanyarwanda mu buryo bw‚Äôumwuga?

storyChapters.title: Kubaka Ikipe
storyChapters.subtitle: Inkingi y‚Äôibanze
storyChapters.content: Samuel yahuye na HIRWA MAZIMPAKA Chris, ufite ubuhanga mu gukora filime. Hamwe, basuzumye uburyo ikoranabuhanga n‚Äôinkuru bishobora guhurira kugira ngo bifashe sinema y‚Äôu Rwanda.

storyChapters.title: Izina Oliviuus
storyChapters.subtitle: Icyubahiro
storyChapters.content: Izina 'Oliviuus' ryaje ku buryo karemano ‚Äî ryashingiye kuri mukuru we Olivier, urukundo rwe rwatangije inzozi. Samuel yahinduye izina rye rikaba rigezweho, ry‚Äôumwuga, kandi ryemewe ku isi hose.

storyChapters.title: Intego
storyChapters.subtitle: Icyerekezo 2024-2025
storyChapters.content: Gushyigikira abahanzi b‚ÄôAbanyarwanda. Gutanga amahirwe y‚Äôubucuruzi n‚Äôimikoranire y‚Äôumwuga. Gushyira inkuru ku rwego rw‚Äôisi. Kwerekana sinema y‚Äôu Rwanda ku bantu bose.

storyChapters.title: Oliviuus Uyu munsi
storyChapters.subtitle: Urugendo rurakomeza
storyChapters.content: Uyu munsi, Oliviuus ihagaze nk‚Äôurubuga rwa sinema mu Rwanda, ihuriza hamwe umuco, udushya, n‚Äôikoranabuhanga. Urubuga rwubatswe ku ntego, rwubahisha abahanzi bigeze mbere kandi rutegura amahirwe ku bazaza.
